string.value: For your fourth mission, meet with #b#p2092001##k in #b#m251000000##k to find the #t4032472#.

#p2092001# says that he will give you the map if complete his request. His request is for you to eliminate the bad pirates #r#o7130104##k and #r#o6130208##k who are harrassing #m251000000#. Elminate the pirates and receive the map.

#o7130104##r #a225871##k
#o6130208##r #a225872##k
Once you eliminated the #o7130104#s and the #o6130208#s, #p2092001# gave you the #t4032472#. He says that it's not a place you can normally get to so you shouldn't even try...
Are you an explorer? I feel a strangely powerful energy emanating from you. I suppose you've come to see me. What is it that you need?\r\n#b#L0#Do you have the #t4032472#?#l\n#k

You must be talking about the island I saw while fishing far out at sea. Yes. I have the map. I can't go out there anymore because of pirates, but I've still got the maps.\r\n#b#L0#Could you give me the #t4032472#?#l\n#k

There are lots of reefs near that island. And the winds are so strong, it is nearly impossible to approach. I've never made it myself. The island looks like a turtle covered in snow, hence its name, but very few people have even heard of it. Still want it?\r\n#b#L0#Yes, I'd still like the map.#l\n#k

Alright, I'll give you the map if you do me one favor. There are a bunch of Red-Nose Pirate #r#o7130104#s#k and #r#o6130208#s#k constantly threatening #m251000000#. Could you eliminate #r100#k of each?
Go outside town and you will find the Red-Nose Pirates' Hideout. If you can eliminate those monsters, I'll give you the map.
But you look so strong. If even you refuse to do this... Are the Red-Nose Pirates that powerful?
You've eliminated the #o7130104#s and the #o6130208#s? Whoa. I'll gladly give you the #t4032472#.
I'll tell you again, don't even think about going to Turtle Island. It's impossible.
You haven't eliminated 100 #r#o7130104#s#k and 100 #r#o6130208#s as I'd asked. Go eliminate them and I will give you the #t4032472#.
